headline: CrowdStrike Falcon for AWS Security Incident Response Strengthens Cyber Resilience for AWS Customers
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, June 16, 2025--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today unveiled Falcon for AWS Security Incident Response at AWS re:Inforce 2025, a new program that provides AWS Security Incident Response customers with industry-leading cyber protection from the AI-native CrowdStrike Falcon® cybersecurity platform at preferred rates in the AWS Marketplace. This program delivers AI-powered incident response to help organizations respond to incidents faster, reduce risk, and strengthen their cloud securit

headline: 1 Volatile Stock with Promising Prospects and 2 to Approach with Caution
summary: Volatility cuts both ways - while it creates opportunities, it also increases risk, making sharp declines just as likely as big gains. This unpredictability can shake out even the most experienced investors.
